name: Philadelphia Appeal. 801-23 South Street Tax Assessment Case

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Philadelphia Appeal. 801-23 South Street Tax Assessment Case.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph H. Lieberman, Solicitor for Board of Revision of Taxes, with him Frank F. Truscott, City Solicitor and Michael D. Hayes, Assistant City Solicitor, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Philadelphia Appeal. 801-23 South Street Tax Assessment Case.
Argued November 15, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Joseph H. Lieberman, Solicitor for Board of Revision of Taxes, with him Frank F. Truscott, City Solicitor and Michael D. Hayes, Assistant City Solicitor, for appellant.
Harry Norman Ball, for appellee.
January 3, 1949:
